txt.en: 'Our supplies run low. The battle must soon end before we do.'
'Yes, but that is not enough. We must show them we can withstand anything they have.'
'If we are to win this battle, we must end it here and now.'
'Tear down their banners, dare them to throw everything they have against you.'
'It is time to call their champions to battle, to defeat the best they have and drive them from Erebor.'
'And when you have crushed it all underfoot, they will have no choice but to retreat.'
'Now go forth, win the day, shatter their army, and break this siege!'
'Word has come from the south of a great victory, doubtless the Easterlings have this news as well.'
'They will be weakened by this news and vulnerable. The time to strike is now.'
